item.title: Smart PC Control Alexa + Remote Access
item.description:
Damn it! I got that file in my pc at home

You ever left home, halfway to wherever you’re going, and suddenly remembered you needed something from your computer? That was me. The worst part? My PC was off.

Well this is actually a situation fairly often for me and I needed a way to turn it on remotely, access it securely and also be able to share files, no matter where I was. That’s when I went down the rabbit hole of Wake-on-LAN, RustDesk, and self-hosted setupsâ€”with some inspiration of course.
